<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Vendor Details Form">183a503c97640210bea8b390f053af85</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:74d4e87897a40210bea8b390f053af57</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Contract end date validation for new</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   // Get today's date of start date field
  var startDate = g_form.getValue('new_vendor_select_contract_start_date');
 
  // Convert the new date string to a Date object
  var newDate = new Date(newValue);
  newDate = newDate.getFullYear() + "-"+newDate.getMonth() + "-"+newDate.getDate();
  // Check if the new date is before today
  if (newDate < startDate) {
    // Show an error message and clear the field value
    g_form.showFieldMsg('new_vendor_select_contract_end_date', 'Please select valid date', 'error');
    //g_form.clearValue('new_vendor_select_contract_start_date');
  }
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-05 12:45:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cfefabb497380210bea8b390f053af1d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Contract end date validation for new</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ordering and Procurement" source="x_1321711_ordering">c93e83a497200210bea8b390f053af2c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ordering and Procurement">c93e83a497200210bea8b390f053af2c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cfefabb497380210bea8b390f053af1d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-06 08:18:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
